name: CommonProceduresRequiringPreProceduralPCISNOMEDCT
title: Common Procedures Requiring Pre Procedural PCI SNOMEDCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of SNOMED-CT codes includes frequent procedures for which a PCI is performed in preparation for the procedure (e.g., valve procedures, organ transplants).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who receive select procedures for which a PCI may be required in preparation for and prior to the procedure (e.g., patients with aortic stenosis undergoing PCI prior to transcatheter aortic valve replacement [TAVR]).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED-CT codes that  indicate procedures for which a PCI is performed in preparation for the procedure (e.g., valve procedures, organ transplants).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes SNOMED-CT codes that do not indicate procedures for which a PCI is performed in preparation for the procedure (e.g., valve procedures, organ transplants).)
